伾字的基本解释

伾
pī
〔伾伾〕众多势盛的样子。

伾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pī］
［《廣韻》敷悲切，平脂，滂。］
［《集韻》攀悲切，平脂，滂。］
(1)《说文·人部》：“伾，有力也。”见“伾伾”。
(2)重叠的山岭。
(3)丑陋。

伾字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　伾； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页97第13
【唐韻】敷悲切【集韻】【韻會】攀悲切，?音胚。【說文】有力也。【詩·魯頌】以車伾伾。　又衆也。　又【集韻】貧悲切。義同。或作伓。　又大伾，山名。【書·禹貢】東過洛汭，至于大伾。【蔡註】今通利軍黎陽縣臨河有山，是也。陸氏作大岯。　又晡枚切，音杯。又鋪枚切，音㚰。又部鄙切，音否。又普鄙切，音噽。義?同。

伾字的源字形

字源演变：

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pī］
["Guangyun" apply sadness, flat fat, and puffy. ]
["Ji Yun" is sad, flat, and peng. ]
(1) "Shuowen·Human Department": "伾, powerful." See "伾伾".
(2) Overlapping mountains.
(3) Ugly.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　伾; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 97-13
[Tang Yun] Putting on the sadness [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Climbing the sadness, the sound embryo. [Said the text] It is also powerful. 【Poetry·Lu Song】Taking a chariot.　You all.　[Ji Yun] Poor and sad. The same meaning. Or as you.　Again, the name of the mountain. 【Book·Yugong】Eastern Luoshao, as for the Dayao. [Cai's Note] Today, Tongli Army has mountains in Linhe, Liyang County, yes. Lu's as Da Lao.　 Another cut, sound cup. Then shop a piece of cut, sound 㚰. Despised again, no sound. It's universal, and the sound is choppy. Righteous? Same.
